description: This table contains guarantor restrictions placed on a financial assistance tracker record to limit the scope of its approval.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_TRACKER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the financial assistance program tracker record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RESTR_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the guarantor account the financial assistance tracker's approval is restricted to.
